diff_hunk:
@@ -2095,3 +2095,263 @@ def call(self, inputs, state):
 
     new_state = rnn_cell_impl.LSTMStateTuple(c, m)
     return m, new_state
+
+
+class MultiplicativeIntegrationRNNCell(rnn_cell_impl.RNNCell):
body: Can you make this subclass LayerRNNCell, and move all the get_variable() calls into a "def build(input_shape):".  at the end of the build function set `self.built = True`.  In `call`, only access variables via `self` (i.e., `self._kernel`, `self._bias`, etc).  See the current LSTMCell and GRUCell implementations to see what I mean.
body_html: Can you make this subclass LayerRNNCell, and move all the get_variable() calls into a "def build(input_shape):". at the end of the build function set self.built = True. In call, only access variables via self (i.e., self._kernel, self._bias, etc). See the current LSTMCell and GRUCell implementations to see what I mean.
body_text: Can you make this subclass LayerRNNCell, and move all the get_variable() calls into a "def build(input_shape):".  at the end of the build function set self.built = True.  In call, only access variables via self (i.e., self._kernel, self._bias, etc).  See the current LSTMCell and GRUCell implementations to see what I mean.
